description: Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 (as amended), in respect of the demolition of the existing buildings on Plots A, B1, C and D1, and the partial demolition, retention and refurbishment of buildings on Plots B2 and B3 and the construction of five buildings of between 3 (plus ground floor) and 15 (plus ground floor) storeys in height. Providing approximately 90,400m2 of laboratory, office, life science, research, and commercial floor space (Land Use Class E) and new public realm and enhancements to the adjacent highway network.
site_name: Land Located to the West of the Former Royal London Hospital, Whitechapel Road, London
